parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.58</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>MPARGUMENTS</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>MPeff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enables or disables a trait or alters a trait of the given unit. Custom trait can only be a [[Bool|bool]].<br><br>
Default traits are:
*[[Number]] '''audibleCoef''' - A lower value means the unit is harder to hear
*[[Number]] '''camouflageCoef''' - A lower value means the unit is harder to spot
*[[Number]] '''loadCoef''' - Equipment weight multiplier affecting fatigue and stamina
*[[Boolean]] '''engineer''' - Ability to partially repair vehicles with toolkit, equivalent to <tt>engineer <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> 1;</tt> in [[CfgVehicles_Config_Reference|CfgVehicles]]
*[[Boolean]] '''explosiveSpecialist''' - Ability to defuse mines with toolkit, equivalent to <tt>canDeactivateMines <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> 1;</tt> in CfgVehicles
*[[Boolean]] '''medic''' - Ability to treat self and others with medikit, equivalent to <tt>attendant <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> 1;</tt> in CfgVehicles
*[[Boolean]] '''UAVHacker''' - Ability to hack drones, equivalent to <tt>uavHacker <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> 1;</tt> in CfgVehicles

</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>unit [[setUnitTrait]] [skillName, value, isCustom] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - The unit whose trait should be set
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> skillName: [[String]] - Name of the skill </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> value: [[Boolean]] or [[Number]] - Value (see above) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> isCustom (optional): [[Boolean]] - Must be set to [[true]] in case of custom</value></part><part><name/>=<value> Param 4
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> Nothing </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[setUnitTrait]] ["Medic",[[true]]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 
</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[getUnitTrait]] [[getAllUnitTraits]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 
</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Bottom Section</h3>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on April 27, 2016 - 18:12 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Revo|Revo]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
The higher the value for the loadCoef the less stamina a unit has. Negative values will dramatically increase the stamina actually to a point where it extends the stamina bar. 
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes -->
</comment>
<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on October 20, 2017 - 05:49 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Midnight|Midnight]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
explosiveSpecialist trait can defuse mines (i.e. satchel charges), whilst the engineer trait alone cannot.
</dd>
</dl>
